entry.title: New release for DumbPad: v1.0.0 - Initial Release
entry.content:
Versioned docker tags added! ðŸš€

  • https://hub.docker.com/r/dumbwareio/dumbpad/tags

At the moment you can use dumbwareio/dumbpad:1.0.0 or dumbwareio/dumbpad:latest as the docker image - moving forward any new changes will become a version release and you can always update/rollback to other versions as needed

What's Changed:

 * Update input type for the PIN element from 'text' to 'password'. by @shivamsnaik in https://github.com/DumbWareio/DumbPad/pull/3 * Add a COOKIE property to store the last used notes while creation, deletion, and loading notepads. by @shivamsnaik in https://github.com/DumbWareio/DumbPad/pull/4 * Add print functionality, Custom site title, and BASE_URL support by @abiteman in preview pane, download/print options, and collaboration mode by @gitmotion in https://github.com/DumbWareio/DumbPad/pull/34 * Update baseurl port to same mapped port on docker compose by @gitmotion in entry.title: New release for DumbPad: v.1.0.1 - your new markdown editor
entry.content:
What's Changed

v1.0.1 - Query Param support, enhance markdown previews with new styles, mirror markdown preview styles for print, new setting, service worker versioning by @gitmotion in https://github.com/DumbWareio/DumbPad/pull/61 - Add new service worker versioning with cache busting (still requires clearing cache for the new change but should auto reload moving forward) - Query Param support for direct notepad selection - with browser history navigation for back and forward functionality & new copy link button - unique notepad naming appending -1, -2, -3 respectively to notepad names - fixes: https://github.com/DumbWareio/DumbPad/issues/18, https://github.com/DumbWareio/DumbPad/issues/8 - thanks to @Justinzobel & @accforgithubtest for the feedback! - Enhanced Markdown Preview styles with support for tables, github style alerts, checkbox lists, and more - fixes - https://github.com/DumbWareio/DumbPad/issues/8 - thanks to @mguilherme for the feedback! - Print preview revamp: - print now mirrors style of markdown preview accurately - auto expands expandable details section for print previews - New setting to disable auto expand details sections for print previews

[!NOTE] New service worker changes should auto bust and reload your cache for you but it that doesn't work Make sure to clear your browser cache and reload to reflect the new changes Dev console > Application > Storage > Clear site data After the new cache has been applied, new versions will auto bust and reload your cache for you moving forward

Full Changelog: https://github.com/DumbWareio/DumbPad/compare/v1.0.0...v.1.0.1 PR: - https://github.com/DumbWareio/DumbPad/pull/61 - https://github.com/DumbWareio/DumbPad/pull/62

Previews

| Feature | Description | Preview | |---|---|---| | Query Params with History | Query parameters are now used for browser back and forward functionality, improving navigation. now with new copy link button! | | | Print Preview (Light/Dark Mode) | The print preview accurately reflects the light/dark mode and styling of the notepad in Markdown. | | | Print Preview Defaults to Expand Collapsed Sections | Print preview now defaults to expanding collapsed sections in Markdown. A new setting is available to disable this behavior. | | | New Markdown Stylings | Added new Markdown stylings for alerts, details/collapse sections, and tables, codeblocks with copy button, along with revamped spacing. | |

Thanks and stay dumb! ðŸš€

entry.title: New release for DumbPad: v1.0.4 - An even better editor experience
entry.content:
| Feature/Fix | Description | Preview | |--------|--------|--------| | New Code Syntax Highlighting | Highlight code syntax in markdown preview mode with copy code language labels with support for ~180 languages from highlightjs |

| | New Split Preview | View live edits in markdown side-by-side your editor with resize handle (mobile-friendly) |
| | New Default View Setting | Select between editor, split, or full as your default view (client-side setting) |
| | New Notepad names used a filenames | /data folder will now use notepad names as filenames with unique filename for better experience from terminal |
|
| Fix Undo/Redo history | Refactor undo/redo history to session stack per client per notepad for better independent tracking |
| | Fix Better tab indent/deindent handling | Tabbing should now correctly work in editor |
|

What's Changed

  • Feat/add code syntax highlighting by @gitmotion in https://github.com/DumbWareio/DumbPad/pull/65
  • Suggestion by @mguilherme https://github.com/DumbWareio/DumbPad/issues/64
  • use notepad names for filenames by @gitmotion in https://github.com/DumbWareio/DumbPad/pull/67
  • Suggestion by @halon314 https://github.com/DumbWareio/DumbPad/issues/66
  • Feat/add split preview by @gitmotion in https://github.com/DumbWareio/DumbPad/pull/68
  • Fix preview styles on light/dark toggle and marked-alerts fix by @gitmotion in https://github.com/DumbWareio/DumbPad/pull/70
  • v1.0.4 - Add support for code syntax highlighting, notepadnames for filenames, & 3-way toggle for split preview by @gitmotion in https://github.com/DumbWareio/DumbPad/pull/69

Full Changelog: https://github.com/DumbWareio/DumbPad/compare/v.1.0.1...v1.0.4

[!NOTE] Service worker should auto bust and reload your cache for you but it that doesn't work Make sure to clear your browser cache and reload to reflect the new changes Dev console > Application > Storage > Clear site data After the new cache has been applied, new versions will auto bust and reload your cache for you moving forward

Stay dumb friends!
